entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 1999/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D96: TÁRKI Omnibus 1999/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Tóth, Zsolt
3. Pongrácz, Tiborné
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Central Statistical Office Demographic Research Institute (3.)
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences and political attitudes 2. opinions about the NATO attack agains Yugoslavia and the EU accession of Hungary 3. attitudes towards bearing children, the child-support system and abortion
entry.dcterms:subject: demography
social behaviour and attitudes
family life, marriage, relationship
mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
economic conditions and indicators
economic policy
social welfare policy and systems
childbearing, family planning and abortion
local society, region
international politics and organisations
conflict, security and peace
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
block 1: A, block 2: A, block 3: B
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
